text: Hianagi ama tare zantre'moke ame huke kagrite eke magoke zupage kazeri fenkami atregaha'e. Negave'ene mofavre nagakamo'za magoke zupage frigahaze. Kagrama antahinka ruzahu ruzahu avua tagazane avune zanema ante'noa zamo kegava hunantegahie hunka'ma nehana zantamimo'a, kza osanigenka ra hazenkefi ufregahane.
